name: Gangster Squad - Origins
description:
GansterSquad's fighting characteristics, continuing the classic stickman style, creating hundreds of unique combinations of skills, customizing nearly a hundred pieces of legendary equipment, rich maps and numerous villains, waiting for your challenges, street adventures, duels of force, fight for the king of kung fu！

[Real map street confrontation]
Multiple super-realistic maps, many people can fight freely on the streets, relying on superb fighting ability, strive to be number one.

[Quick operation, cool combo]
A variety of real violent weapons, real physical strike simulation, let you have a happy battle experience.

[Characteristic development, breakthrough growth]
Balanced growth skill system, personalized equipment appearance system, real violent attribute growth, giving you the best fighting experience
